summary: A pretty young lady found in the Riverwood Giant Inn. She has some abilities like shouts that should be unlocked the higher the level you are.
descriptionHtml:
My very First Mod so go easy folks, im working on a huge mod im sure everyone will enjoy, im remaking Cyrodiil and \"Unlocking\" the South gate, Ive made the Imperial Sewers so far and the Gate and a few other things i will keep you all updated! Also There is a video showing off Sophia i uploaded to youtube and should be on here soon! ENJOY!!!

VIDEO: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6WFO1H52lTw
author: PearsonSW
